addFormImplementation(address,uint32,uin.details: allows an admin to add a Form implementation to the factoryformStateRegistryId_ 1 is default for all form implementations, pass in formStateRegistryId_ only if an additional state registry is required

params.formImplementationId_: is the id of the form implementation (generated off-chain and equal in all chains)
params.formImplementation_: is the address of a form implementation
params.formStateRegistryId_: is the id of any additional state registry for that form

changeFormImplementationPauseStatus(uint.details: allows an admin to change the status of a form

params.extraData_: is optional & passed when broadcasting of status is needed
params.formImplementationId_: is the id of the form implementation

createSuperform(uint32,address).details: To add new vaults to Form implementations, fusing them together into Superforms

params.formImplementationId_: is the form implementation we want to attach the vault to
params.vault_: is the address of the vault

returns.superformId_: is the id of the created superform
returns.superform_: is the address of the created superform

getAllSuperformsFromVault(address).details: Reverse query of getSuperform, returns all superforms for a given vault

params.vault_: is the address of a vault

returns.superformIds_: is the id of the superform
returns.superforms_: is the address of the superform

getFormImplementation(uint32).details: returns the address of a form implementation

params.formImplementationId_: is the id of the form implementation

returns.formImplementation_: is the address of the form implementation

getFormStateRegistryId(uint32).details: returns the form state registry id of a form implementation

params.formImplementationId_: is the id of the form implementation

returns.stateRegistryId_: is the additional state registry id of the form

getSuperform(uint256).details: returns the address of a superform

params.superformId_: is the id of the superform

returns.formImplementationId_: is the id of the form implementation
returns.superform_: is the address of the superform

isFormImplementationPaused(uint32).details: returns the paused status of form implementation

params.formImplementationId_: is the id of the form implementation

returns.paused_: is the current paused status of the form formImplementationId_

isSuperform(uint256).details: returns if an address has been added to a Form

params.superformId_: is the id of the superform

stateSyncBroadcast(bytes).details: to synchronize superforms added to different chains using broadcast registry
